job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We're seeking an intern with hands-on expertise in Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing and Generative AI to join our team. In this role, you will design and build innovative and ethically responsible Generative AI solutions that effectively address real-world problems, balancing technical feasibility with user needs and business impact. Working at the intersection of natural language processing and machine learning, you will contribute to developing AI solutions that directly impact patient outcomes and Philips' growth in the healthcare sector.

   Your role:
     * Design, train, and evaluate NLP and LLM-based solutions for various use cases, including retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), information retrieval & search, chatbots, structured information extraction and named entity recognition, text generation, summarization, and more
     * Clean, preprocess, and curate data for evaluation, fine-tuning, and training
     * Work closely with stakeholders across the organization to understand business needs, formulate problems, and deliver data-driven insights
     * Keep up the latest advancements in generative AI research and integrate new techniques into the development process
job_details.full_text:
Internship: Generative AI Engineer

We're seeking an intern with hands-on expertise in Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing and Generative AI to join our team. In this role, you will design and build innovative and ethically responsible Generative AI solutions that effectively address real-world problems, balancing technical feasibility with user needs and business impact. Working at the intersection of natural language processing and machine learning, you will contribute to developing AI solutions that directly impact patient outcomes and Philips' growth in the healthcare sector.

   Your role:
     * Design, train, and evaluate NLP and LLM-based solutions for various use cases, including retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), information retrieval & search, chatbots, structured information extraction and named entity recognition, text generation, summarization, and more
     * Clean, preprocess, and curate data for evaluation, fine-tuning, and training
     * Work closely with stakeholders across the organization to understand business needs, formulate problems, and deliver data-driven insights
     * Keep up the latest advancements in generative AI research and integrate new techniques into the development process

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes designing, developing, and evaluating NLP and LLM-based solutions, including RAG, chatbots, and text generation. It also mentions fine-tuning and training models, which are core to Generative AI. The mention of 'ethically responsible Generative AI solutions' and working with 'natural language processing and machine learning' further supports this classification. While 'Machine Learning' is mentioned, the focus is on generative applications rather than predictive modeling.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'Design, train, and evaluate NLP and LLM-based solutions' and lists specific generative AI tasks like 'retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), information retrieval & search, chatbots, structured information extraction and named entity recognition, text generation, summarization'. This directly aligns with the core modeling activities for generative AI.
job_tasks.phrase: Design, train, and evaluate NLP and LLM-based solutions for various use cases, including retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), information retrieval & search, chatbots, structured information extraction and named entity recognition, text generation, summarization

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Clean, preprocess, and curate data for evaluation, fine-tuning, and training' describes essential data engineering activities required to prepare data for model development.
job_tasks.phrase: Clean, preprocess, and curate data for evaluation, fine-tuning, and training

job_tasks.justification: The statement 'Work closely with stakeholders across the organization to understand business needs, formulate problems, and deliver data-driven insights' highlights the importance of understanding business context and translating it into technical requirements.
job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with stakeholders across the organization to understand business needs, formulate problems, and deliver data-driven insights

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Keep up the latest advancements in generative AI research and integrate new techniques into the development process' directly points to the need for continuous learning and adaptability in a fast-evolving field.
job_tasks.phrase: Keep up the latest advancements in generative AI research and integrate new techniques into the development process

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'ethically responsible Generative AI solutions' indicates a focus on responsible AI development.

soft_skills.phrase: Keep up the latest advancements in generative AI research and integrate new techniques into the development process
Work closely with stakeholders across the organization to understand business needs, formulate problems
